div.p:
Predictions of present-day GIA-related uplift rates across Antarctica derived from forward modelling and data inversion. a– d Results derived using GIA forward models that adopt a 1-D Earth model
17, 18, 30, 32, 141, 145 ; in b an Earth model that reflects low viscosity West Antarctic mantle rheology is used. e, f Results derived using GIA forward models that adopt a 3-D Earth model
55, 56 ; ( e) uses the same ice model as c; ( f) uses the same ice model as a. g, h Results derived using coupled ice sheet–sea level models that include ice-sheet change through to present
10, 87 . i– l Results derived from the inversion of geodetic data
42– 44, 146 ; note that i– l are reduced in their precision away from data constraints. See original publications for further details
